comment: Professor Albert was my teacher at University of California, Fresno. I took his Marketing 100s course and he is by far one of the best teachers I've ever had! He is a true inspiration. His class is entertaining and he is willing to work with you on anything. He gives quizzes and his test are reasonable and will provide a study guide.

Professor was awesome except when it came to the group project. No outline for the make/break assignment and group mates not held accountable for anything. Sry but if your not a fan of group assignments. AVOID this class. it was pretty redic. Great professor and test were easy but the project was a joke at best

Great Prof.! Study guide is test, question for question. Huge groups for final project makes it easy. However the peer evaluation isn't really a fair and accurate way of determining grades. I got a B in the class because of the peer evaluation despite doing a SIGNIFICANT amount of work on the project b/c its due before the project is done.

Hands down best professor at KSU. Study guide for all 3 tests optional final. Easy quizzes before each class, major project (this is what you want to focus on) that will give you real life experience. Take him! Got an A! He is entertaining and just darn awesome!

Albert is hilarious, willing to help, and a great teacher. However, he will not hesitate to call you out during presentations, make an example of your tardiness, or have you kicked out for cheating. Keep good discussion in class and he will be more willing to work with your test schedules and help whenever and wherever possible.Take him if you can.

One of the best professors at KSU. As long as you put a little effort into the class, aren't late every day and you try your best on the project you'll succeed! Super down to earth and if you need help with the class or just wanna chat you can go to his office and he'll give you a coke! Great guy, great professor, great class.

Professor Albert is a great professor!  He can really connect well with his students.  The term project makes up a substantial amount of your grade, but he helps your group through the entire thing.  Attendance is not mandatory, but you better show up to class.  The exams are straight from the study guide!

Awesome Professor! If you have a chance to take him for any class, do yourself a favor and grab it before it fills up! Tests straight from study guides, provides real world experience, & very flexible!

Albert is a great teacher and his class is a lot of fun, however you will have to work fairly hard if you want to make an A. He is very enthusiastic and does a good job of presenting the material in a interesting and pertinent way.
Prof. is very excited about this class. His quizzes are hard but his tests are easy just know EVERYTHING on his study guides. Group project was great; big groups 8-9 people.
Prof. Albert was very interesting and he kept his class up to date and didn't just go by the text book.  I would definitely recommend him.
You would be an idiot not to take his class, certain things aren't guaranteed but do good on the tests and work hard in the group and an A is almost a sure thing
One of the best professors at the school. Take his class.

One of the best professors I have had at KSU. Wish more professors taught like him and have his mentality. The course was interesting, fun and I learned a lot. The team project is put off to the end of the term--I would suggest getting to know your team mates before the end of the term and begin working on the project then, if possible.

By far one of my favorite teachers! He wants everyone to succeed and is very entertaining the entire semester! I learned so much in his class and actually enjoyed going! If you do good on first 2 tests you do not need to take the final and can just focus on project. Tells you exactly what is on the test, I loved this class and would take him again!

Attendance is not mandatory but he gives 10 mini quizzes (usually every other class and not test weeks) that count as participation. If you do bad on his tests you can still make an A because the project is worth most of your grade. Had him twice and would take him again!!

Dr. Albert was one of my favorite profs this semester!  He makes learning fun and interesting desires for his students to do well.  Like the other posts, he makes it very clear what to study for. As stated before,there are quizzes, 2 exams, 1 final(optional depending on other 2 finals), and 1 group project.  He's great!!

This guy is awesome! He doesn't teach you stuff you don't need to know but actually strives to teach you what you will need to know for your future career.  He has two tests that are essentially easy easy A's as long as you study but he gives you what questions are gonna be on the test. He is actually funny and makes class time go by real quick.
Great teacher, really helpful, tells you exactly what you need to know for the tests. Makes class really interesting and interactive. Most of the material is common knowledge. An easy A

I had the pleasure of having Prof. Albert as my advertising teacher. He is great-totally straight forward with the class,doesn't play games or treat you like little kids, and makes the class enjoyable. He is a personable and funny guy and makes the class interesting. Class involves two tests, a final, quizes(not bad at all), and a project.
